title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 33: Allu Arjun starrer enters sees 65% drop on 5th Monday; film become - TOI Etimes
summary:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 33: Allu Arjun starrer enters sees 65% drop on 5th Monday; film becomes biggest Hindi blockbuster as it enters Rs 800 crore club

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Unspecified

On its 33rd day of release, 'Pushpa 2' has reached a significant milestone, marking itself as the biggest Hindi blockbuster by crossing the Rs 800 crore mark, despite experiencing a 65% drop in box office collections on its fifth Monday.

  • The film, featuring Allu Arjun, has become a massive hit, particularly among Hindi-speaking audiences.
  • The substantial drop in revenue highlights the typical trend in box office collections after an initial surge.
  • This achievement reflects the film's strong appeal and marketing strategies.
“'Pushpa 2' has taken the box office by storm, becoming a cultural phenomenon.”

In conclusion, 'Pushpa 2' has not only achieved remarkable financial success but has also established itself as a significant player in the Hindi film market, paving the way for future regional films to achieve similar feats.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Achieves Milestone at the Box Office Amid Significant Drop

summary:

Published on: Jan 7, 2025 12:00 am IST

Today, a few Tamil media reports stated that Lyca Productions is trying to halt the release of Game Changer. It was said that Lyca approached the Tamil Producers Council to stop Game Changer’s release in Tamil Nadu until Indian 3 is completed and released. This news disappointed Ram Charan fans heavily, as Game Changer is now the most anticipated Pongal release.

Doubts were raised about the smooth release of Game Changer in Tamil Nadu. Here is the latest update from the distributor: “All decks are cleared for the Grand Release of #GameChanger in Tamil Nadu!!! Thank you to all the film fraternity circles who extended their goodwill and support.”

Rockfort Entertainment is releasing Game Changer in Tamil Nadu, and the action drama will have the biggest release for Pongal. The majority of the theatres will be screening Game Changer in Shankar’s homeland, and bookings are expected to go live tomorrow. Kiara Advani, Anjali, SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Jayaram, Naveen Chandra, and others played vital roles.

title: Music Review: On 'Perverts,' Ethel Cain's gloomy Americana turns industrial - Hindustan Times
summary:
Music Review: On 'Perverts,' Ethel Cain's gloomy Americana turns industrial

Published on: Jan 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Ethel Cain has released her second studio album, 'Perverts,' which explores themes of self-gratification and self-loathing through a mix of post-industrial noise and haunting vocals. This album is the second part of a trilogy following her acclaimed debut, 'Preacher's Daughter.'

  • The album features darkly angelic vocals and an aggressive experimental sound.
  • Instrumentation includes unique elements like the hurdy gurdy.
  • The music blends ambient influences with slowcore elements.
  • The title track references the Titanic, setting a somber mood.
  • Despite being challenging, the album may redefine musical boundaries for Cain's audience.
“If you love me / keep it to yourself.”

This sophomore release adds depth to Cain's artistic expression, though it risks alienating some fans while pushing musical experimentation.
newTitle: Ethel Cain's 'Perverts': A Gloomy Americana Album with Industrial Elements

title: The Rock’s WWE Return: What You Need to Know About His Role, WrestleMania Plans, and More - Ringside News
summary:
The Rock’s WWE Return: What You Need to Know About His Role, WrestleMania Plans, and More

Publication Date: January 5, 2025
Source: Ringside News

With The Rock set to appear on tonight’s Monday Night Raw Netflix debut, fans are eager for answers about his WWE return. Here’s a breakdown of everything you need to know about The Great One’s involvement, from his status on the Board of Directors to his WrestleMania plans.

When Did WWE and The Rock Agree on His Return?

Technically, they didn’t. As a member of WWE’s Board of Directors, The Rock has never truly been “gone.” He’s been vocal about his plans to appear regularly now that WWE is on Netflix.

Is His Return Tied to the $13 Million WWE Paid Him?

No, the $13 million payout was part of a stock deal he negotiated last year and is unrelated to his presence on tonight’s show.

Will Moana 2 Affect His WWE Schedule?

Not at all. Principal photography for Moana 2 has wrapped, and The Rock has stated his work on the film is done.

What Are The Rock’s WrestleMania Plans?

That’s entirely up to him. Whether he wants to face Cody Rhodes, Roman Reigns, or pursue another angle, The Rock’s preferences will shape WWE’s creative direction.

The Rock’s role in WWE reflects the company’s shift toward a Hollywood-style business model, prioritizing big names and big money. His influence is greater than ever as WWE enters its new Netflix era.

What do you think about The Rock’s role in WWE moving forward? Who do you want to see him face at WrestleMania? Share your thoughts in the comments below!
newTitle: The Rock's WWE Return: Key Details and WrestleMania Plans

title: A.R. Rahman Launches Bharat Maestro Awards for Indian Classical Music (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
summary:
A.R. Rahman Launches Bharat Maestro Awards for Indian Classical Music

Date: [Insert Publication Date] | Source: Variety

Oscar, BAFTA, Golden Globe, and Grammy-winning composer A.R. Rahman and the KM Music Conservatory have unveiled the Bharat Maestro Awards, a new initiative celebrating Indian classical music and its practitioners.

  • The awards feature three categories: young musician awards, a lifetime achievement honor for educators, and a state medallion for regional contributions to classical music preservation.
  • A notable mentor panel includes Asha Bhosle, Amjad Ali Khan, and Bombay Jayashri.
  • Winners will receive cash prizes and perform internationally, collaborating with Rahman.
  • The awards follow the traditional guru-shishya format for presentation.
“The greatest joy of a guru is to witness the success and growth of their students...,” said Rahman.

The launch coincided with the KM Music Conservatory’s 16th anniversary, further bridging tradition and modernity in music education.
newTitle: A.R. Rahman Launches Bharat Maestro Awards for Indian Classical Music

title: Ajay Devgn feels today's audience is less forgiving: ‘Our mistakes were overlooked' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Ajay Devgn feels today's audience is less forgiving: ‘Our mistakes were overlooked'

Date: Jan 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Ajay Devgn discusses the differences in audience reception between his early career and today, highlighting a shift towards greater scrutiny and less forgiveness for mistakes among newcomers.

  • Ajay Devgn remarks on how the audience was more forgiving when he started in Bollywood.
  • He believes that today's audience demands higher accountability from actors.
  • Devgn emphasizes the increased pressure on new actors to perform well immediately.
  • He expresses confidence in the current generation's preparedness for the industry.
  • Ajay's upcoming film, Azaad, showcases themes of loyalty and courage, set in pre-Independence India.
“Back in the day, we used to work and learn simultaneously... But the audience today is much more aware and unforgiving.” - Ajay Devgn

In conclusion, Ajay Devgn's insights reflect the evolving expectations of film audiences and the challenges faced by new actors in a competitive industry environment.

Publication Date: January 5, 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Pushpa 2: The Rule has earned an estimated ₹1206.20 crore in India over its first 32 days, with Day 33 earnings of ₹1.24 crore, positioning it as a strong contender for the highest-grossing Indian film.

Key Points

  • Total earnings for Pushpa 2 so far: ₹1206.20 crore in India.
  • Day 33 earnings: ₹1.24 crore, lower than previous days.
  • Projected total earnings for the run: ₹1,685 crore.
  • Worldwide collection as of January 5: ₹1,698 crore, including ₹268.5 crore from overseas.
  • Second-highest grosser in Indian cinema, aiming to surpass Dangal's ₹2,070 crore mark.
“Pushpa 2 The Rule has declared to be the fastest Indian movie to cross the ₹1,700 crore mark.”

  • Jaideep Ahlawat reprises his role as Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary in an eight-episode narrative.

“Hathi Ram Chaudhary wasn’t just a character; it became a mirror reflecting the complexities of society and humanity.” - Jaideep Ahlawat

Paatal Lok Season 2 is expected to challenge viewers with its layered storytelling and emotional depth, reinforcing its status as a leading crime drama.
